评论概述: Order your regular size despite other reviews.
评论详情: The stitching looks great. I guess they read the feedback and reviews on that part. UPDATE- the replacement XLs fit mostly like XLs, but I wish the top of the pants were taller, and the tops go down lower (I am 6'1"). The length of the legs is about 35" inseam wise. The SAND colored set came without a breast pocket, and no thigh pockets as pictured and described, so I returned them. They sellers paper return label (no scan code available) me with a $6.?? return fee since they had been removed from packaging and washed (I do this with all my new clothes; and only noticed the missing pockets once I was at work). I will revise once I see how the seller handles this super legit return. The other 4 colors had breast and thigh pockets. Super screaming deal!!!

评论概述: First order ok then comes the bad service
评论详情: False advertising

评论概述: This is not the same product that I ordered a couple years ago.
评论详情: The first set I ordered was amazing!  When I needed more scrubs for work I "reordered" the set that I had bought because they have been fantastic for what I wanted. They were comfortable and had the pockets, which I love, that I wanted.  The two I received, are not the same thing. As you can see from the photo the colors do not match, the lighter colored one is the NEW product. On the new product, the v-neck seam goes down to almost the pocket, which I do not like. The fabric doesn't feel the same either and seems cheap. Once I opened the package I saw the difference and thought that it was the lighting because it was lighter in color and is almost shiny. It wasn't the lighting.  I am returning the "reorder" and will be looking for different scrubs. If they are able to actually duplicate my original order, I am interested.

Ordered the Large size orange scrubs and they fit perfectly! Ran thru the wash before wearing and they're extremely comfy. I'll be wearing these all day and with the elastic waistband they're more comfortable than my regular pants. Perfect length as well. The short sleeve is just about the right size, maybe a bit snug. The color is vibrant and holds fabric marker well. Only one small thread was loose in the seams. It's a tight weave so they don't breathe as much, but I expect that to get better over time and after several washes. Pockets on the shirt are great. No place to hang my badge. Pants have pockets on the seat, but not the sides which would be my only suggestion for improvement.

I have purchased many pairs of scrubs in my 30 years of being in healthcare and I must say that I am somewhat disappointed with the quality of this product! I bought these scrubs to wear on the days that I see patients in the clinic.  I am 6'1" and these scrub pants are too short for me.  The scrub pant pockets are not deep enough and items tend to fall out of your pocket when you sit. The material has a rough feel and they have to be ironed after being washed (throwing them in the dryer will not take care of the wrinkles)! The pant drawstring is flimsy so much and so that I broke the string on the first pair that I tried to tie. I was expecting a better quality product and I would have sent them back to the vendor for a refund but I have a tendency to wash/clean any item that I purchase before wearing, so by me washing the scrubs eliminated me from returning them!
The material is rough even after a few washes. But will it last I suppose so. With that being said why complain.
Perfect for work
